description: Two electric variants representing the biggest change for the illustrious 5-series range do not disappoint Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car review: BMW i5 an electrifying introduction to executive class
title_page: Car review: BMW i5 an electrifying introduction to executive class | The Straits Times
maintext:
LISBON, Portugal – There is a running joke about BMW drivers not ever signalling when they change lanes. One cryptic meme shows a BMW signal stalk covered in cobwebs.
BMW must have heard that one. Which is probably why the new electric i5 – its first electric saloon in the executive 5-series range – comes with a novel option: automatic lane change.
